name: 100% Hotter
overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion eyesores are stripped of their excessive make-up and outrageous clothes and transformed by fashion stylist Grace Woodward, hair designer Daniel K Palmer and makeup Melissa Sophia.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion eyesores are stripped of their excessive make-up and outrageous clothes and transformed by fashion stylist Grace Woodward, hair designer Daniel K Palmer and makeup Melissa Sophia.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Series two of the inspirational make-under show asks what the great British public really thinks about striking, individual and unique styles that can make people stop and stare. An expert team of three stylists experiment with new looks and help people understand more about themselves and what makes them tick, with a bit of fun and banter along the way.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion eyesores are stripped of their excessive make-up and outrageous clothes and transformed by fashion stylist Grace Woodward, hair designer Daniel K Palmer and makeup Melissa Sophia. Can the team persuade 20-year-old Barbie lookalike Jade to ditch the doll, and find a more office-friendly style for pierced and tattooed Goth rock chick Maisie?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion eyesores are stripped of their excessive make-up and outrageous clothes and transformed by fashion stylist Grace Woodward, hair designer Daniel K Palmer and makeup Melissa Sophia. The Style Team work their magic on a 23-year-old Goth cosplay fanatic who loves dressing up as Alice in Wonderland and a 25-year-old Disney princess who has taken her obsession with crazy contouring and fake hair to extreme lengths.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion eyesores are stripped of their excessive make-up and outrageous clothes and transformed by fashion stylist Grace Woodward, hair designer Daniel K Palmer and makeup Melissa Sophia. The Style Team work their magic on 24-year-old alternative model Ismini who has taken her look to greater and greater extremes, and 21-year-old Jordan who counts Katie Price, Rylan and Joey Essex as his role models.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion eyesores are stripped of their excessive make-up and outrageous clothes and transformed by fashion stylist Grace Woodward, hair designer Daniel K Palmer and makeup Melissa Sophia. The Style Team work their magic on 23-year-old hairdresser Jodie whose revealing outfits are attracting the wrong type of men, and 25-year-old Aggy who has an unhealthy obsession with pink.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion eyesores are stripped of their excessive make-up and outrageous clothes and transformed by fashion stylist Grace Woodward, hair designer Daniel K Palmer and make-up Melissa Sophia. The Style Team work their magic on 23-year-old drag queen Sophie who lacks her own identity, and 22-year-old Thomas who has realised his love of womenswear is doing little for his love life.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion eyesores are stripped of their excessive make-up and outrageous clothes and transformed by fashion stylist Grace Woodward, hair designer Daniel K Palmer and make-up Melissa Sophia. The Style Team work their magic on 23-year-old Jade whose busty dressing is holding her back, and 20-year-old Tasmin who has created an extreme persona to hide her Albinism.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion eyesores are stripped of their excessive make-up and outrageous clothes and transformed by fashion stylist Grace Woodward, hair designer Daniel K Palmer and make-up Melissa Sophia. The Style Team work their magic on 23-year-old transwoman Lydia who is trying to find a feminine look that works for her, and 23-year-old Sasha who is sick of being compared to Kat Slater.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion frightmares are transformed by Style Team Grace Woodward, Daniel K Palmer and Melissa Sophia. Wearing little more than her underwear, black lipstick and a long black wig, Takeisha describes her look as 'Goth inspired', but would love to look like Beyonce. Psychotic pop singer Aimee's pastel-hued, OTT Bubblegoth look has spilled from the stage into her everyday life...

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Abbey's Dad wants her to tone down her skimpy outfits.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Candy queen Danny styles everything out of sweets.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Entertaining makeunder series in which fashion eyesores are stripped of their excessive make-up and outrageous clothes and transformed by fashion stylist Grace Woodward, hair designer Daniel K Palmer and makeup Melissa Sophia.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The stylists Karen Williams, Daniel K Palmer and Melissa Sophia go to work on scantily-clad Summer who teeters into the Hot Spot on skyscraper heels. Cyber Goth Nathan meanwhile, his extreme look is topped off by an impenetrable studded mask.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The stylists Karen Williams, Daniel K Palmer and Melissa Sophia go to work on mother of three Leona, who thinks nothing of doing the school run in buttock-skimming PVC hot pants and thigh-high red stockings.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The stylists set to work on Kiki who favours the fairy-tale princess look, her fiance Ben who has a goth king image, and busy single-mum Cindy who papers over her heartbreak with industrial levels of make up and super skimpy clothes.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The stylists Karen Williams, Daniel K Palmer and Melissa Sophia go to work when Daniella arrives in a PVC number that leaves little to the imagination, while John admits that all creativity goes into his drag alter ego Ava, leaving John drab and plain.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Taylor's multi-coloured rainbow unicorn get-up is costing her a fortune and is so out there that she struggles to find a job. Magaluf party girl Becky's tangerine tan is so out of control that she has turned to harsh domestic products to take it all off.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The stylists Karen Williams, Daniel K Palmer and Melissa Sophia take on two extremely different challenges - a woman whose life is ruled by her make-up regime and a hell-raising goth whose look scares children.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Lewis is obsessed with tanning and working out; his mum wants him to look more natural. Kasey layers on her foundation in severe contouring lines because she is convinced her face looks like a potato without them.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The stylists Karen Williams, Daniel K Palmer and Melissa Sophia take on Jade who dresses like a five-year-old, never seen without pink, petticoats and glitter. Andy rocks up looking like a tired 1980s metalhead.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Super-stylists Karen Williams, Daniel K Palmer and Melissa takes on club promoter Charlotte who turns heads for all the wrong reasons, while scantily clad mum Chanice spends so long getting ready that she misses out on family time.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Super-stylists Karen Williams, Daniel K Palmer and Melissa Sophia show sex kitten Lolly, who bases her look on Pamela Anderson in Baywatch, and cyber goth Darius that toning down is better than OTT, and give them a fresh new look.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Series two of the inspirational make-under show asks what the great British public really thinks about striking, individual and unique styles that can make people stop and stare. An expert team of three stylists experiment with new looks and help people understand more about themselves and what makes them tick, with a bit of fun and banter along the way.
